attributes.action: stop the blatant discretion of Prison Service Instructors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
To stop the blatant discretion of prison service instructors, in that they where the only ones that were never given a pay increase for 2006/2007.
this is against the Goverment, Home Office and Prison Service Rules and Regulations

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several already in existence –
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/HMPStaffPay/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
